creator: Giacomo Leopardi
description:
LibriVox recording of The Poems of Giacomo Leopardi by Giacomo Leopardi. (Translated by Frederick Townsend.)
Read in English by rodgrover; Rosslyn Carlyle; John Trevithick; Jennifer Woodside; Nic Sebastian; Ken Masters; Anusha Iyer; sarah louise pieplow; Amanda Vickery; Filippo Festuccia; Stav Berman
This is a volume of poems by Giacomo Leopardi. - Summary by Carolin
For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;
